1: Password must be at least eight characters.
2: Password must have at least one number.
3: The numbers in the password must add up to twenty-seven or more.
4: The password must have a day of the week.
5: Oh look at an egg 🥚, add it to your password to take care of it.
6: Add the answer to the following riddle: Beth's mother has three daughters. The eldest is called Clara, the little one is Sara. What is the median called?.
7: The password must have the tenth, eleventh, and twelfth digits of π.
8: Ah, the egg must need heat, put at least one 🔥 on each side so that it is warm.
9: The password must have Nikola Tesla's date of birth in the following format dd-mm-yyyy
10: What is the name of the phobia of the color yellow?
11: Add an @ to make your password even more secure!
12: look the egg has finally hatched... aww a chick 🐣, now it's yours, save it in your password 🥰.
